channel.title: [PI] Pking [PI] Rep++
channel.description: Well i would like to have a Safe pking zone on my server, but tbh i have no idea where to start..if anyone could help me out I'll rep++ ya.

item.title: [PI] Pking [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @singed singed
item.description:
@singed wrote:

well, you can start by making a void that states that the coordinate range you put in orders it not to lose items on death and restore health etc… (possibly just create the coordinate range for the safe area and then apply an already added deathstage for a safe minigame?)

Read full topic
